content: this free supplement will work with either the regular 9 inch sized little cotton rabbit animal patterns or the newer small 7 inch sized animals you will need to use it in conjunction with one of the existing dress patterns - either one that comes with included in an animal pattern or one of the dress collection patterns seasonal dresses textured dresses or small dresses work the skirt part up to and including the waist decrease from one of those patterns and then use the free bodice pattern to create a new sundress option also included are brief instructions on using the bodice to make a little camisole/vest top pictures of both the sundress and the camisole in both sizes are above i hope you enjoy using the new free supplement and it gives you lots more options for creating outfits for your little cotton rabbit animals happy knitting j xx
